26 #ifndef REFERENCE_SERVER_H
27 #define REFERENCE_SERVER_H
28 
29 namespace Mutation {
30  namespace Utilities {
31 
43 template <typename T, int size>
44 class ReferenceServer
45 {
46 public:
47  static T& serve() {
48  return m_refs[(++m_current < size ? m_current : m_current = 0)];
49  }
50 
51 private:
52  static T m_refs [size];
53  static int m_current;
54 }; // class ReferenceServer
55 
56 template <typename T, int size>
57 int ReferenceServer<T, size>::m_current = 0;
58 
59 template <typename T, int size>
60 T ReferenceServer<T, size>::m_refs [size];
61 
62  } // namespace Utilities
63 } // namespace Mutation
64 
65 #endif // REFERENCE_SERVER_H
